Mantap! Rupiah Tekuk Dolar AS ke Rp 13.978
06 Nov 2019, 02:49 by Zulfi Suhendra


Foto: Hasan Alhabshy

Jakarta - Nilai tukar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS) terhadap rupiah pagi ini berada di level Rp 13.978. Demikian dikutip dari data perdagangan Reuters, Rabu (6/11/2019).Rupiah terhadap dolar hari ini tercatat paling kuat dibanding beberapa bulan belakangan. Rupiah akhirnya bisa keluar dari tekukan dolar di level Rp 14.000.Dolar AS dalam dua pekan terakhir tercatat bergerak stabil di bawah level Rp 14.100. Secara point to point dibandingkan setahun yang lalu, mata uang Paman Sam bergerak di rentang Rp 13.885-15.198.Gubernur BI Perry Warjiyo menjelaskan nilai tukar rupiah ke depan masih ada potensi penguatan."Sebetulnya itu menunjukkan masih ada ruang bagi rupiah untuk lebih menguat dan terbukti beberapa kali di bawah 14.000," kata Perry di Gedung BI, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Dia mengungkapkan, penguatan bisa terjadi karena angka inflasi yang rendah dan prospek ekonomi yang baik sehingga kredibilitas ekonomi Indonesia terjaga dan pasar nyaman dengan kebijakan-kebijakan yang ada.Perry menyebutkan, pergerakan nilai tukar rupiah terhadap dolar AS ini dipengaruhi oleh sejumlah korporasi yang membutuhkan dolar dan kemudian meningkatkan pembelian baik impor atau untuk pembayaran.Simak Video "Rupiah Terus Perkasa Terhadap Dolar AS"[Gambas:Video 20detik](zlf/zlf)

Great! Rupiah Bend the US Dollar to Rp 13,978
Nov 6 2019, 02:49 by Zulfi Suhendra


Photo: Hasan Alhabshy

Jakarta - The exchange rate of the United States dollar (US) against the rupiah this morning is at the level of Rp 13,978. As quoted from Reuters trade data, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Rupiah against the dollar today was recorded to be the strongest compared to recent months. The rupiah could finally come out of the buckling of the dollar at the level of Rp. 14,000. The US dollar in the past two weeks has been recorded moving stable below the level of Rp. Point-to-point compared to a year ago, Uncle Sam's currency moved in the range of Rp 13,885-15,198. BI Governor Perry Warjiyo explained that the rupiah exchange rate in the future would still have the potential to strengthen. several times under 14,000, "Perry said at the BI Building, Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019). He revealed, the strengthening could occur due to low inflation rates and good economic prospects so that the credibility of the Indonesian economy is maintained and the market is comfortable with policies policies. Jerry said, the movement of the rupiah against the US dollar was influenced by a number of corporations that needed dollars and then increased purchases either imported or for payment.
